price: (41) The Day when no relation[1465] will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: [1465]- i.e., patron, protector or close associate.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī mawlan ʿan mawlan shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
